content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 1 ** you can find the free video tutorial here https //youtu be/jeh_yvw6vva about the pattern this rectangle crochet basket tutorial creates a beautiful and sturdy crochet basket with double layered sides you can make this crochet basket pattern as big as you d like with easily repeating the rounds of the pattern the basket crochet pattern is easy to make using only single_crochet and half_double_crochet stitches skill level - easy crochet terminology - the pattern is written using english u s terminology materials needed hooks size needed 5 5 mm / i & 6 mm / j the pattern is crocheted with 2 strands held together of worsted #4 weight cotton yarn total amount of yarn needed 130gr/259m/283yds additional materials needed 5 stitch markers optional finished size - base 6x4 5 in 15 2x11 4 cm height 3 inch 7 6 cm - can be worked to a bigger size if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2025 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the design photos and video in this pattern are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final this pdf pattern is free from viruses and safe to use it includes links to reputable websites however users should exercise caution when accessing external links from unknown sources gpsr representative ciara doyle c15 y5f9 ireland ciara@thefairythorn ie 1 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
